net.pandoragames.far.ui.model

Interface ProgressListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    OperationCallBackListener, ProgressBarUpdater, SubSelectDialog

    public interface ProgressListener
    Progress listener. Receives notifications about the progress of searches or find-and-replace operations. Implicitely there are three types of operations:
    • Simple Find: Lookup for file names that match a particular pattern.
    • Content Find: Allways preceeded by a simple find, this operation will in addition match the content of the fieles in the result set of the previous operations agains some (regular) expression.
    • Find And Replace: Always preceeded by simple find and content find.
    Author:
    Olivier Wehner at 27.02.2008

    • Method Detail

      • operationStarted

        void operationStarted(OperationType type)
        Gets notified when an operation has been started.
        Parameters:
        type - type of operation that has been started

      • operationProgressed

        void operationProgressed(int count,
                       int total,
                       OperationType type)
        Receives progress informations. The total count parameter can not be provided for simple find operations and will thus be minus one.
        Parameters:
        count - progress count
        total - total count to be attained or -1 if unknown
        type - type of operation that is progressing

      • operationTerminated

        void operationTerminated(OperationType type)
        Notified when the operation has terminated.
        Parameters:
        type - type of operation that has terminated

      • operationAborted

        void operationAborted(OperationType type)
        Notified when the operation has been aborted.
        Parameters:
        type - type of operation that has been aborted
